landing.title: Changing Businesses & Lives
landing.description: Mercy Munyange is a Business and Product Development Expert with over twelve years of experience in Business Development, Digital Financial Services, Digital Solutions, Data Analytics & Customer Experience sectors. Her extensive experience spans in Kenya, Tanzania, Nigeria and Caribbean, USA specialized in strategy development and deployment of Technology solutions.
